title.rendered: Smile Foundation conducted a workshop at Campion School

content.rendered: Smile Foundation conducted a workshop at Campion School in Bhopal on October 21, 2023. With the participation of 1,500 students and 15 teachers, this workshop tackled critical topics of adolescent behavior and health. It aimed to reduce anxiety, depression, and social challenges, empower students with self-care skills, and instill personal control over life’s stressors. Additionally, it stressed the importance of hygiene and prioritizing health over stress. The Smile Foundation also introduced the children to the Childline service (1098) for critical situations. This transformative workshop left a lasting impact, inspiring students to prioritize their well-being, manage stress, and seek support when needed, ultimately promoting their personal growth. Our sincere thanks to the Smile Foundation and Campion School for this invaluable initiative, which is helping shape a brighter future for today’s adolescents.
